item.title: A message from Guidance:
item.description: Students looking to make a course change MUST sign up for a meeting in the Guidance office. Last day for course changes is Monday, February 9th.

item.title: A message from Mrs. Curtis:
item.description: Wishing Mr. Curtis a very Happy Birthday today!

item.title: A message from Mr. Vonesch:
item.description: STA's annual "Shrove Tuesday Pancake Breakfast" is coming up in less than 2 weeks! If you need volunteer hours, or would just like to help make and serve pancakes, please see Mr. Vonesch at the chaplaincy office to sign up!

item.title: A message from Ms. Bradley:
item.description: Students in grades 9,10,11 who are interested in writing the February University of Waterloo math contests are asked to see Ms. Bradley in room #207 at lunch today or tomorrow. The deadline for ordering contests is Mon. Feb. 9th.

item.title: A message from Mr. Benoit:
item.description: There will be a meeting in room 247 at 11:20 for the 7&8 hockey players attending next week's hockey tournament. The list is posted in the 7&8 stair well.

item.title: A message from Mr. Decoste:
item.description: There wjll be a meeting for 7/8 boys volleyball at 9:05 in room 148
